SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_serviceprocess WHERE (groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_serviceprocess.processName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceprocess.processNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]))

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT opencps_processorder.processOrderId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId AND opencps_processstep.processStepId = ? WHERE opencps_processorder.processStepId IN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId ) OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processorder.*, opencps_dossier.serviceConfigId, opencps_dossier.subjectId, opencps_dossier.subjectName, opencps_dossier.receptionNo, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName, opencps_processstep.stepName, opencps_processstep.sequenceNo, opencps_processstep.daysDuration, opencps_processstep.referenceDossierPartId FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId AND opencps_processstep.processStepId = ? WHERE opencps_processorder.processStepId IN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId ) OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processstep.processStepId, opencps_processstep.stepName FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId WHERE opencps_processorder.processStepId IN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId ) OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?
